FAQ.question: Does the site ask for any signup or payment to use the profile picture cropper tool?
FAQ.answer: No, our tool is completely online and free. The tool does not ask for any further payments.

FAQ.question: Does the platform save the cropped profile picture inside the tool itself for the example basis?
FAQ.answer: No, the tool does not send or save any of your files to our servers. All the operations are performed by the browser itself; therefore, all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Is there any risk of corruption by using the profile picture cropper tool?
FAQ.answer: No, the profile picture cropper tool is built with all the latest programs and security features which does not allow the uploaded image files to be corrupt. So, the uploaded image files are safe and secure.

FAQ.answer: Yes, the profile picture cropper tool is a cross-platform-based feature, where the user can use this cropping tool from operating systems such as Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac OS.

FAQ.answer: The quality adjustment option of the profile picture cropper tool is an essential feature that allows the user to decide the overall quality of the image. FAQ.answer: The profile picture cropper tool offers various parameters after we upload a profile picture; these parameters include the name of the image, shape of the image, type of the image, etc. The parameter also gives us the time, date, and time zone where it was last modified.
